name: The Simplest Game
description:
This is actually the simplest game. Everything in this game is simple!
  • Do you want a deeply thought-out plot? --- It's not here! (Or at least it shouldn't be)
  • Do you want to enjoy heavenly graphics at 4K, 60 FPS? --- What are you talking about? It's a 2D platformer with pixel graphics!
  • Would you like to hear some epic music? --- The game has a couple of great 8-bit tunes!
The developer was so lazy that he made every level the same!
But not everything is as simple as it seems at first glance:
  • Each level is a new puzzle!
  • You have to use 100% of your brain and 200% of your logic!
  • Every function of the game can help you complete the level!
  • The game has 3 colorful locations!
Try not to break your brain in this plotless(???) adventure!
